member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_ERROR_CODE
member.summary: Specifies the kind error that occurred with a timed text track.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_ERROR_CODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_ERROR_CODE_DATA_FORMAT
member.summary: An error occurred with the data format of the timed text track.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_ERROR_CODE.MF_TIMED_TEXT_ERROR_CODE_NETWORK
member.summary: A network error occurred when trying to load the timed text track.
